DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine MSDC-0160 effective treatment Type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Placebo Controlled Safety Efficacy Study MSDC-0160 Type 2 Diabetes With Active Comparator
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Type 2 Diabetes naive metformin Male female ( postmenopausal surgically sterilize ) , 18 70 year age . Use diabetes medication metformin . History heart failure previous myocardial infarction . Blood pressure great 160/100 mmHg .
